numeric.name: nof
numeric.value: UTILEX_MAX( DATA(trunk, parameters, pool_info, max_nof_members_in_group, 0), DATA(trunk, parameters, pool_info, max_nof_members_in_group, 1)) > 64 ? 128 : 256

numeric.name: nof_lb_keys_per_profile
numeric.value: UTILEX_MAX( DATA(trunk, parameters, pool_info, max_nof_members_in_group, 0), DATA(trunk, parameters, pool_info, max_nof_members_in_group, 1)) > 64 ? 256 : 128

numeric.name: dbal_egress_trunk_index_multiplier
numeric.value: UTILEX_MAX( DATA(trunk, parameters, pool_info, max_nof_members_in_group, 0), DATA(trunk, parameters, pool_info, max_nof_members_in_group, 1)) > 64 ? 32 : 16
